refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A tertiaryie identifies a third-level word or words in an indexentry.
In indexentrys, you can specify as many tertiary terms as are necessary. Secondary and tertiary terms can be mixed, following the primary.
Formatted as a displayed block. A tertiaryie occurs below a secondaryie. If more than one tertiaryie occurs, they are usually aligned with each other and indented from the secondary.
